availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: David Brewer (Franklin County, Kentucky, murder victim)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of Enoch Brewer. Married to Sarah Roberts Brewer. Father of Virginia Brewer. Resident of Franklin County, Kentucky, in 1850. Killed by John Roberts, Jr., in Henry County in December 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 2, p. 77B.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #2275.
KYR-0001-021-0045.
